roleset.name: (try to) cause motion, causing motion

alias.framenet: Cause_motion Manipulation Earnings_and_losses Experience_bodily_harm Ingest_substance Undressing Dressing
Cause_motion Manipulation Earnings_and_losses Experience_bodily_harm Ingest_substance Undressing Dressing

roleset.note: PULL-V NOTES: Comparison with push, Member of Vncls carry-11.4, get-13.5.1, hold-15.1-1, hurt-40.8.3-1-1, push-12-1, split-23.2. Updated by Julia, 10/2010. (from pull.01-v)
PULL-N NOTES: Based on verb pull.01; Member of Vncls carry-11.4, get-13.5.1, hold-15.1-1, hurt-40.8.3-1-1, push-12-1, split-23.2. Updated by Julia, 10/2010. (from pull.01-n)

roles.note: No instances with args 2, 3 found, there for symmetry with verb entry. (from pull.01-n)

role.descr: DIR, destination or attribute of arg1

example.name: DIR = in
example.text: A Kellogg officer said [the Memphis project]-1 was ``pulled *trace*-1 in for a reconsideration of costs,'' an indication that the ambitious plans might be scaled back in any future construction.
example.arg: an indication that the ambitious plans might be scaled back in any future construction

example.name: attribute = lower
example.text: Compaq Computer nose-dived $8.625 a share, to $100, and pulled other technology issues lower after reporting lower-than-expected earnings after the stock market closed Wednesday .
example.arg: after reporting lower-than-expected earnings after the stock market closed Wednesday

example.name: attribute = together
example.text: But [Mr. Wolf]-1 faces a monumental task in *trace*-1 pulling the company back together again.

example.name: DIR = back, unstated thing moving
example.text: Even Drexel is pulling back.

example.name: with distance
example.text: At the investment firm of Smith Barney, Harris Upham& Co., [the commodity-chemical segment]-1 is seen *trace*-1 pulling down overall profit for 20 companies representative of the whole industry by 8% to 10%.
example.arg: overall profit for 20 companies representative of the whole industry

example.name: Arg0,1,2
example.text: A few days ago, I came out from changing the laundry to his pulling the baby monitor off the table and laughing.

example.name: Arg 0 only
example.text: Totally absorbed, the ringers stare straight ahead, using peripheral vision (they call it "rope-sight") to watch the other ropes and thus time their pulls.

example.name: Args 0 & 1
example.text: The new "resident" takes his place at the top waiting for his pull of the lever.

example.name: With direction
example.text: The adjustment to the front camber made the most difference in eliminating the pull to the left on my car.

roleset.name: various quasi-idiomatic usages
roleset.note: PULL-V NOTES: Similarly "pull a prank", etc. No Vncls. Checked by Julia, 10/2010. (from pull.06-v)

example.name: pull the plug
example.text: John pulled the plug on his pet fish's life-support, then flushed the little bugger.

example.name: pull the wool over
example.text: John-1 tried *trace*-1 to pull the wool over Mary's eyes, but she saw through him nonetheless.

example.name: pull-v
example.text: The company pulled their ads from the controversial show.

example.name: pulling-n
example.text: Also, I'm pretty sure their pulling the show off the air and making it an online exclusive caused them to make the shortsighted decision to cut the show's budget.

roleset.name: exit, leave, withdrawing
roleset.note: PULL_OUT-V NOTES: Member of Vncls withdraw-82-1. Updated by Julia, 10/2010. (from pull.02-v)

example.name: transitive
example.text: As a result, UAL's chairman, Stephen M. Wolf, pulled out of the buy-out effort to focus on running the company.
example.arg: to focus on running the company

example.name: with causal agent
example.text: She and her husband pulled most of their investments out of the market after the 1987 crash, although she still owns some Texaco stock.
example.arg: although she still owns some Texaco stock

example.name: Arg1,2
example.text: I wonder if there is not some bigger reason for the candidate's sudden pulling out of the race.

roleset.name: make it, survive
roleset.note: PULL_THROUGH-V NOTES: No Vncls. Checked by Julia, 10/2010. (from pull.04-v)

roles.note: The intransitive sounds much better than the transitive. (from pull.04-v)

example.name: intransitive
example.text: Despite his life-threatening illness, John pulled through.

example.name: transitive
example.text: John pulled through his life-threatening illness.

example.name: Arg0
example.text: The doctors informed Dorothy that Johan had cancer and that there was only a slim chance of his pulling through.

roleset.name: manage to do despite
roleset.note: PULL_OFF-V NOTES: No Vncls. Checked by Julia, 10/2010. (from pull.03-v)

example.name: transitive
example.text: John pulled off a blindingly brilliant dissertation defense, despite his having not slept in three weeks.
example.arg: despite his having not slept in three weeks

example.name: Arg0,1
example.text: But given the history and the forces of globalization, I wouldn't bet more than a single-shot latte against his pulling it off.

roleset.name: (cause to) move to the side, moving to the side (of the road, for example)
roleset.note: PULL_OVER-V NOTES: No Vncls. Checked by Julia, 10/2010. (from pull.05-v)

example.name: all args
example.text: The policeman pulled John over to the side of the road.
example.arg: to the side of the road

example.name: Arg0,1
example.text: What about the suspect's pulling over two teenagers in his car that was set up to look like an unmarked police vehicle?
example.arg: in his car that was set up to look like an unmarked police vehicle

roleset.name: similar to a chin-up
roleset.note: PULL_UP-N NOTES: Added by Julia based on more-nouns. No corresponding VNcls. (from pull.02-n)

roles.note: Watch out for LVCs "do a pull-up". (from pull.02-n)

example.name: LVC, from more-nouns
example.text: When they take their sons out for some exercise , they-1 do n't even have the strength *WHADVP*-2 *pro*-1 to do a single pull - up [*-2]!

example.name: both args, LVC
example.text: My friend Larry and I discovered that the brick wall encircling Shea could be breached if one got a boost and did a pull-up to the top.

roleset.name: pull protein complexes out of a solution

example.name: example with intentional agent
example.text: We pulled down the protein complexes with glutathione-Sepharose and detected p53 by western blotting (Fig. 1d).

example.name: example with solution
example.text: After extensive washing, cells were lysed, and the antibody-bound fraction of the protein was pulled down from the lysate with protein A-Sepharose.
example.arg: the antibody-bound fraction of the protein
